languages.text: Хейнрикс ван Калокс, предатель Империума и попиратель священных клятв Инквизиции, не пережил своего последнего путешествия с изменницей Человечества, ради которой забыл о своем долге. Его жизнь забрала сама {name} фон Валанциус, ставшая вассалом древнего ужаса и уничтожившая своего бывшего возлюбленного, что попытался не убить ее, а воззвать к ее разуму и сердцу.
languages.translation_comment: Был в ростере и игрок поклонился Ктану и романс зафинален по хидден пасу

languages.text: Heinrix van Calox, traitor to the Imperium and breaker of the sacred oaths of the Inquisition, did not survive his last journey with the betrayer of Humanity for whom he had renounced his duty. {name} von Valancius, now vassal to an ancient horror, took his life. She destroyed her former lover not for trying to kill her but for appealing to her mind and heart.
languages.original_text: Хейнрикс ван Калокс, предатель Империума и попиратель священных клятв Инквизиции, не пережил своего последнего путешествия с изменницей Человечества, ради которой забыл о своем долге. Его жизнь забрала сама {name} фон Валанциус, ставшая вассалом древнего ужаса и уничтожившая своего бывшего возлюбленного, что попытался не убить ее, а воззвать к ее разуму и сердцу.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix van Calox, traitor to the Imperium, the defier of sacred oaths of the Inquisition, did not survive his last journey with the betrayer of humanity, for whom he has forgone his duty. {name} von Vanalcius, who became a vassal for the ancient horror, took his life herself. She destroyed her former lover, as he tried not to kill }her, but to plea to her mind and heart.

Heinrix van Calox, traitor to the Imperium, the defier of sacred oaths of the Inquisition, did not survive his last journey with the betrayer of humanity, for whom he has forgone his duty. {name} von Vanalcius, who became a vassal for the ancient horror, took his life herself. She destroyed her former lover, as he tried not to kill }her, but to plea to her mind and heart.

Heinrix van Calox, traitor to the Imperium and defier of the sacred oaths of the Inquisition, did not survive his last journey with the betrayer of Humanity, for whom he had renounced his duty. {name} von Valancius, who had become a vassal for the ancient horror, took his life herself. She destroyed her former lover not for trying to kill her but for pleaing to her mind and heart.

Heinrix van Calox, traitor to the Imperium and defier of the sacred oaths of the Inquisition, did not survive his last journey with the betrayer of Humanity, for whom he had renounced his duty. {name} von Valancius, who had become a vassal for the ancient horror, took his life herself. She destroyed her former lover not for trying to kill her but for pleaing to her mind and heart.

Heinrix van Calox, traitor to the Imperium and breaker of the sacred oaths of the Inquisition, did not survive his last journey with the betrayer of Humanity for whom he had renounced his duty. {name} von Valancius, now vassal to an ancient horror, took his life. She destroyed her former lover not for trying to kill her but for appealing to her mind and heart.

Heinrix van Calox, traitor to the Imperium and breaker of the sacred oaths of the Inquisition, did not survive his last journey with the betrayer of Humanity for whom he had renounced his duty. {name} von Valancius, now vassal to an ancient horror, took his life. She destroyed her former lover not for trying to kill her but for appealing to her mind and heart.

languages.text: 海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，帝国的叛徒，背弃审判庭神圣誓言之人，死在了他与人类叛徒最后的旅行之中。他为那个名为{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯的异端分子抛弃了自己的职责，而她却沦为了远古恐怖之物的走狗，亲手结束了他的生命。直到最后一刻，海因里希也没打算杀害他的爱人。他希冀再次唤醒她的灵魂与心灵，可他的爱人却无情地杀害了他。
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, traitor to the Imperium and breaker of the sacred oaths of the Inquisition, did not survive his last journey with the betrayer of Humanity for whom he had renounced his duty. {name} von Valancius, now vassal to an ancient horror, took his life. She destroyed her former lover not for trying to kill her but for appealing to her mind and heart.

traits.locale_text: 海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，帝国的叛徒，背弃审判庭神圣誓言之人，死在了他与人类叛徒最后的旅行之中。他为那个名为{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯的异端分子抛弃了自己的职责，而她却沦为了古代恐怖的走狗，亲手结束了他的生命。直到最后一刻，海因里希也没打算杀害他的爱人。他希冀再次唤起她的灵魂与心灵，可他的爱人却无情地杀害了他。

languages.text: Heinrix van Calox, Verräter am Imperium und Schänder der heiligen Gelübde der Inquisition, überlebte seine letzte Reise mit der Verräterin an der Menschheit nicht, für die er seiner Pflicht abgeschworen hatte. {name} von Valancius, {mf|nun zum Vasallen|nun zur Vasallin} des uralten Grauens geworden, nahm ihm das Leben. Sie vernichtete ihren ehemaligen Geliebten nicht, weil er versucht hatte, sie zu töten, sondern weil er an ihren Verstand und ihr Herz appelliert hatte.
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, traitor to the Imperium and breaker of the sacred oaths of the Inquisition, did not survive his last journey with the betrayer of Humanity for whom he had renounced his duty. {name} von Valancius, now vassal to an ancient horror, took his life. She destroyed her former lover not for trying to kill her but for appealing to her mind and heart.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix van Calox, Verräter am Imperium und Schänder der heiligen Gelübde der Inquisition, überlebte seine letzte Reise mit der Verräterin an der Menschheit nicht, für die er seiner Pflicht abgeschworen hatte. {name} von Valancius, die zur Vasallin des uralten Grauens geworden war, raubte ihm persönlich das Leben. Sie vernichtete ihren ehemaligen Geliebten nicht, weil er versucht hatte, sie zu töten, sondern weil er an ihren Verstand und ihr Herz appelliert hatte.

languages.text: Heinrix van Calox, parjure de l'Imperium ayant brisé ses serments sacrés d'inquisiteur, ne survécut pas à son dernier voyage aux côtés {mf|du traître|de la traîtresse} de l'humanité, pour qui il avait renoncé à ses devoirs. {name} von Valancius, {mf|devenue vassale|devenu vassal} de l'horreur ancienne, tua son ancien amant de ses propres mains ; non pas parce qu'il avait osé {mf|le|la} trahir, mais parce qu'il avait tenté de faire appel à son esprit et à son cœur.
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, traitor to the Imperium and breaker of the sacred oaths of the Inquisition, did not survive his last journey with the betrayer of Humanity for whom he had renounced his duty. {name} von Valancius, now vassal to an ancient horror, took his life. She destroyed her former lover not for trying to kill her but for appealing to her mind and heart.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix van Calox, parjure de l'Imperium ayant brisé ses serments sacrés d'inquisiteur, ne survécut pas à son dernier voyage aux côtés de la traîtresse de l'humanité, pour qui il avait renoncé à ses devoirs. {name} von Valancius, devenue vassale de l'horreur ancienne, tua son ancien amant de ses propres mains ; non pas parce qu'il avait osé la trahir, mais parce qu'il avait tenté de faire appel à son esprit et à son cœur.

languages.text: Heinrix van Calox, traidor al Imperium y desertor de los juramentos sagrados de la Inquisición, no sobrevivió a su último viaje con la enemiga de la Humanidad por la que había renunciado a su deber. {name} von Valancius, ahora vasalla de la pesadilla ancestral, acabó con su vida personalmente. Destruyó a quien decía amar no porque hubiera intentado matarla, sino porque trató de apelar a su corazón.
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, traitor to the Imperium and breaker of the sacred oaths of the Inquisition, did not survive his last journey with the betrayer of Humanity for whom he had renounced his duty. {name} von Valancius, now vassal to an ancient horror, took his life. She destroyed her former lover not for trying to kill her but for appealing to her mind and heart.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix van Calox, traidor al Imperium y desertor de los juramentos sagrados de la Inquisición, no sobrevivió a su último viaje con la enemiga de la Humanidad por la que había renunciado a su deber. {name} von Valancius, ahora vasalla de la pesadilla ancestral, acabó con su vida personalmente. Destruyó a quien decía amar no porque hubiera intentado matarla, sino porque trató de apelar a su corazón.

languages.text: 帝国の逆賊として異端審問庁の聖なる誓いに背いたハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスは、自らの務めをなげうってまで行動を共にした、人類の反逆者との旅を生きて終えることがなかった。古の恐怖の配下にくだった{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスが、その手でハインリックスの命を絶ったのだ。{mf|彼|彼女}がかつての恋人を屠ったのは、自分が殺されそうになったからではなく、心に強く届けられた訴えのためであった。
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, traitor to the Imperium and breaker of the sacred oaths of the Inquisition, did not survive his last journey with the betrayer of Humanity for whom he had renounced his duty. {name} von Valancius, now vassal to an ancient horror, took his life. She destroyed her former lover not for trying to kill her but for appealing to her mind and heart.

traits.locale_text: 帝国の逆賊として異端審問庁の聖なる誓いに背いたハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスは、自らの務めをなげうってまで行動を共にした、人類の反逆者との旅を生きて終えることがなかった。古の恐怖の配下にくだった{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスが、その手でハインリックスの命を絶ったのだ。{mf|彼|彼女}がかつての恋人を屠ったのは、自分が殺されそうになったからではなく、心に強く届けられた訴えのためであった。

languages.text: İmparatorluk haini ve Engizisyon'un kutsal yeminlerini bozan Heinrix van Calox, İnsanlığa ihanet eden ve Sorgucu'nun görevini bir kenara atmasına neden olan {name} von Valancius'la çıktığı son yolculukta yaşamını yitirdi. Kadim bir dehşetin kuklasına dönüşmüş olan von Valancius tarafından öldürüldü. Eski âşığını, onu öldürmeye kalktığı için değil de zihnini ve kalbini cezbettiği için yok etti.
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, traitor to the Imperium and breaker of the sacred oaths of the Inquisition, did not survive his last journey with the betrayer of Humanity for whom he had renounced his duty. {name} von Valancius, now vassal to an ancient horror, took his life. She destroyed her former lover not for trying to kill her but for appealing to her mind and heart.

traits.locale_text: İmparatorluk haini ve Engizisyon'un kutsal yeminlerini bozan kişi Heinrix Van Calox, İnsanlığa ihanet eden ve Sorgucu'nun görevini bir kenara atmasına neden olan {name} von Valancius'la çıktığı son yolculukta yaşamını yitirdi. Kadim bir dehşetin kuklasına dönüşmüş olan von Valancius tarafından öldürüldü. Eski âşığını, onu öldürmeye kalktığı için değil, zihnini ve kalbini cezbettiği için yok etti.

languages.translation_comment: Был в ростере и игрок поклонился Ктану и романс зафинален по хидден пасу
